cause.description:
Make walking on the sidewalks more viable and pleasurable in India.
1. Government and Businesses need to be more sensitive to needs of pedestrians
2. Create Zebra crossing and Usable pavements diligently.
3. Traffic signals need allow adequate time for pedstrians to cross comfortably.
cause.mission: Make walking on the sidewalks more viable and pleasurable in India.
cause.name: Pedestrian Rights India
